00016 template <class DATA, int DIMENSIONALITY, class PRECISION>
00017 ImageOf<DATA,DIMENSIONALITY> DownsampleAlong(
00018         const PointOf<DIMENSIONALITY, PRECISION> &ptDimension,
00019         const SourceOf<DATA,DIMENSIONALITY,PRECISION>& iIn
00020 )
00021 {
00022         typedef PointOf<DIMENSIONALITY,PRECISION> POINT;
00023 
00024         ImageOf<DATA,DIMENSIONALITY> iOut;
00025         
00026         POINT ptScale=POINT(1) + ptDimension;
00027         iOut.Allocate(iIn.Size()/ptScale);
00028 
00029         DATA pxlm1;
00030         DATA pxl0;
00031         DATA pxlp1;
00032 
00033         forpoint(POINT,pt,0,iOut.Size()){
00034                 GetPoint(iIn,pxlm1,pt * ptScale - ptDimension);
00035                 GetPoint(iIn,pxl0,pt * ptScale);
00036                 GetPoint(iIn,pxlp1,pt * ptScale + ptDimension);
00037                 SetPoint(iOut,pt,(pxlm1 + 2*pxl0        + pxlp1 )/4);
00038         }
00039 
00040         return iOut;
00041 }
00042 
00043 //============================================================================
00044 //============================================================================
00045 template <class DATA, int DIMENSIONALITY, class PRECISION>
00046 ImageOf<DATA,DIMENSIONALITY> Downsample(
00047         int cTimes,
00048         const SourceOf<DATA,DIMENSIONALITY,PRECISION>& srcIn,
00049 )
00050 {
00051         if (cTimes==0){
00052                 ImageOf<DATA,DIMENSIONALITY> iOut;
00053                 AllocatedCopy(iOut,srcIn);
00054                 return iOut;
00055         }
00056 
00057         ImageOf<DATA,DIMENSIONALITY> iOut=Downsample(srcIn);
00058         while(cTimes>1){
00059                 ImageOf<DATA,DIMENSIONALITY> iT=Downsample(iOut);
00060                 iOut=iT;
00061                 cTimes--;
00062         }
00063 
00064         return iOut;
00065 }

00069 //============================================================================
00070 // 2D
00071 //============================================================================
00072 template <class DATA, class PRECISION>
00073 ImageOf<DATA,2>Downsample(
00074         const SourceOf<DATA,2,PRECISION>& src
00075 )
00076 {
00077         ImageOf<DATA,2> iT0  = DownsampleAlong(src,Point2D(1,0));
00078         ImageOf<DATA,2> iOut = DownsampleAlong(iT0,Point2D(0,1));
00079 
00080         return iOut;
00081 }
00082 
00083 
00084 //============================================================================
00085 // 3D
00086 //============================================================================
00087 template <class DATA, class PRECISION>
00088 ImageOf<DATA,3>Downsample(
00089         const SourceOf<DATA,3,PRECISION>& src
00090 )
00091 {
00092         src.PrepareForAccess();
00093         ImageOf<DATA,3> iT0  = DownsampleAlong(src,Point3D(1,0,0));
00094         ImageOf<DATA,3> iT1  = DownsampleAlong(iT0,Point3D(0,1,0));
00095         ImageOf<DATA,3> iOut = DownsampleAlong(iT1,Point3D(0,0,1));
00096 
00097         return iOut;
00098 }

00107 template <class DATA, int DIMENSIONALITY, class PRECISION>
00108 ImageOf<DATA,DIMENSIONALITY>Downsample(
00109         int cTimes,
00110         SourceOf<DATA,DIMENSIONALITY,PRECISION>* psrcIn
00111 )
00112 {
00113         ClaimPointer(psrcIn);
00114         if (cTimes==0){
00115                 ImageOf<DATA,DIMENSIONALITY> iOut;
00116                 AllocatedCopy(iOut,*psrcIn);
00117                 ReleasePointer(psrcIn);
00118                 return iOut;
00119         }
00120 
00121         ImageOf<DATA,DIMENSIONALITY> iOut=Downsample(*psrcIn);
00122         ReleasePointer(psrcIn);
00123         while(cTimes>1){
00124                 ImageOf<DATA,DIMENSIONALITY> iT=Downsample(iOut);
00125                 iOut=iT;
00126                 cTimes--;
00127         }
00128 
00129         return iOut;
00130 }
